content:
Quick reminder for folks who may have signed up to participate in the ballot -- everything is up and open!

If you've not experienced the joys of balloting, I recorded a ballot review session in realtime at https://youtu.be/gnCnoimI4lY (the first 2 minutes of which might be slightly useful as an introduction if you've never seen the HL7 Ballot Desktop before; the next 47 minutes was just a way to force myself to avoid distractions ;-))

Maybe I'll livestream the next one :p

I am trying to enter Jira trackers for ballot comments on HL7 FHIRÂ® IG: Pharmacy; Prescription Drug Monitoring Program (PDMP), Release 1- US Realm. I cannot find this ballot on the Specifications list. Which one do I use? Thanks.
I believe it's called "US Pharmacy" - @Melva Peters can you confirm? (Also might be good to update Jira to the current name...)

Lloyd McKenzie said:

I believe it's called "US Pharmacy" - Melva Peters can you confirm? (Also might be good to update Jira to the current name...)

Thanks Lloyd. I tried that one, but the available versions did not line up.
